description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Biography and History of the Indians of North America ... also a history of their wars ... Likewise exhibiting an analysis of the ... authors, who have written upon ... the first peopling of America. Third edition, with ... additions ... corrections and ... engravings.]" Author: DRAKE, Samuel Gardner. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.cc.10." Page: 348 Place of Publishing: Boston, [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1836 Edition: Fifth edition, with large additions ... and numerous engravings. MS. notes [by the Author]. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000979691 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
